sentences.en: All the signs and announcements were rendered in English and Spanish.
sentences.cn: 所有的指示标志和公告都被译成了英语和西班牙语。

sentences.en: At his lordship's death in the Spanish campaign in the year 1811,his estate fell in to the family of the Tiptoffs.
sentences.cn: 这位爵爷在1811年西班牙战役中死亡后，他的产业归蒂普托夫家族支配。

sentences.en: Clare and David Astor are sketching a view of far Spanish hills.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔和戴维·阿斯特正在画远处西班牙山峦的风景素描。

sentences.en: First-year students may elect  French, Spanish, or German.
sentences.cn: 一年级学生可选修法语、西班牙语或德语。

sentences.en: For this production she has learnt the role in Spanish.
sentences.cn: 为了这次演出，她已经学会了用西班牙语演这个角色。

sentences.en: He contracted Spanish flu, which almost killed him.
sentences.cn: 他得了西班牙流感，险些丧命。

sentences.en: He swore in Spanish, another indication that he was rattled.
sentences.cn: 他用西班牙语破口大骂，这再次表明了他极为烦躁。

sentences.en: I guessed from his name that Jose must have been Spanish.
sentences.cn: 根据他的名字我猜测何塞一定是西班牙人。

sentences.en: I'm correcting the proofs of the Spanish edition right now.
sentences.cn: 我正在校正西班牙语版本的校样。

sentences.en: One pandemic of Spanish flu took nearly 22 million lives worldwide.
sentences.cn: 西班牙流感的大爆发夺去了全球近2,200万人的生命。

sentences.en: Policemen jumped over the wall of the Spanish Embassy in pursuit.
sentences.cn: 警察在追捕中跳过西班牙大使馆的围墙。

sentences.en: Spanish identity documents state the bearer's profession.
sentences.cn: 西班牙的身份证件会注明证件持有者的职业。

sentences.en: Spanish police have seized cocaine valued at around $53 million.
sentences.cn: 西班牙警方查获了一批价值约5,300万美元的可卡因。

sentences.en: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.cn: 英国人和西班牙人是首先向北美洲开拓殖民地的。

sentences.en: The Spanish Inquisition charged him with sinning against God and man.
sentences.cn: 西班牙宗教法庭指控他亵渎上帝和人类。

sentences.en: The Spanish media were still sniping at the British press yesterday.
sentences.cn: 西班牙媒体昨天仍然在攻击英国媒体。

sentences.en: This Spanish drama has a vein of black humour running through it.
sentences.cn: 这出西班牙戏剧自始至终都带有几分黑色幽默。

sentences.en: Traditional Spanish food is delicious and its specialities are worth searching out.
sentences.cn: 传统的西班牙食品美味可口，其特色菜肴值得寻访。

words.tran_cn: 西班牙的；西班牙语的；西班牙人的

trans.tran_en: the language used in Spain and parts of Latin America

trans.tran_cn: 西班牙的，西班牙人的，西班牙语的，西班牙式的
trans.tran_en: relating to Spain, its people, or its language

trans.tran_cn: 西班牙语，西班牙人，〈美〉新墨西哥州的别名，[地名] [加拿大] 西班牙村
trans.tran_en: the language used in Spain and parts of Latin America
relating to Spain, its people, or its language
